tool_description: Retrieves age-appropriate developmental milestones from standardized frameworks for specific developmental domains and age ranges.

developmental_domains.description: Domains to query: cognitive, language, motor, social-emotional, adaptive

framework.description: Assessment framework: CDC, ASQ, Denver, Bayley

error_messages: Invalid age range: child_age_months must be between 0 and 216 months
Unknown developmental domain: Use only cognitive, language, motor, social-emotional, adaptive
Unsupported framework: Choose from CDC, ASQ, Denver, or Bayley
usage: Specify the child's age in months and select developmental domains to retrieve relevant milestones. Optionally choose a specific assessment framework.

milestones.description: List of milestone descriptions for the specified domains and age

age_range.description: Age range category for the milestones
